overview:
Inovaz is a digital experience design start-up focused on developing great tools for online recruitment.

Projects: OVIA A web application that helps recruitment & admissions teams to dramatically reduces the time and money it takes to find the best candidates out there.

It replaces the first round of screening (the time consuming phone interview or even the first round of face to face interviews) with an online video interview. OVIAâ„¢ gives teams an insight into a candidateâ€™s personality and soft skills.

FatStudent A web application that helps higher education students with the financial pressures that University brings.

The solution we provide makes the process of finding a part-time job as simple as possible for students. We do this through our location based job board where we allow students to showcase their soft-skills in a 30 second video using a webcam; allowing student employers to see candidates’ communication skills that are essential for the roles they perform.

Additionally by focusing on the student community we are creating a platform for businesses to better target this important demographic.
